result.title: Invitation to Overnight Coding
result.content:
Hi everyone ,

The much awaited BIT Mesra Overnight Coding is here to endeavour with a challenging problem set and codechef goodies to be won. Get yourself ready to hone your programming skills and take home the respect and swag :)

It is an individual event.

Date : 22nd March 2016 ( Today)

Time : 9:30 pm to 1 am (3 hrs 30 mins).

Contest Link : BIT Mesra Overnight Coding

Problem Setters : subway , droidkid , b4world , marvel308 , vinay24 , sourabh1024

The problems will be of varying difficulty- from cakewalk to hard .

Register now , and yes to be eligible for prizes, fill the google doc as well on the contest page :)

All the Best :)
